prompts: Create a lazy Pokemon that enjoys napping in the sun with a fluffy coat.
Imagine a laid-back creature that rolls around in the grass, looking for snacks.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a sloth but has a playful side when awake.
Show me a sleepy Pokemon with a unique body shape that loves to lounge.
Generate a cute, sloth-like Pokemon with big eyes and a friendly expression.
Make a Pokemon that embodies relaxation, with soft colors and a calm demeanor.
Give me an adorable creature that prefers to chill rather than battle.
